metadata.description: Data Hub Subscription Name e.g. s101d01. Used as a prefix for created resources
Data Hub Environment Name e.g. ees. Used as a prefix for created resources
The name of the publisher app
The name of the key vault

sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT * FROM dbo.Theme WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE Id IN (SELECT ThemeId FROM dbo.Topic WHERE Id IN (SELECT TopicId FROM dbo.Publication WHERE Id IN (SELECT PublicationId FROM Release WHERE Id = CONVERT(UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, '@{pipeline().parameters.releaseId}'))))
SELECT * FROM dbo.Topic WHERE Id IN (SELECT TopicId FROM dbo.Publication WHERE Id IN (SELECT PublicationId FROM Release WHERE Id = CONVERT(UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, '@{pipeline().parameters.releaseId}')))
SELECT * FROM dbo.Publication WHERE Id IN (SELECT PublicationId FROM Release WHERE Id = CONVERT(UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, '@{pipeline().parameters.releaseId}'))
SELECT * FROM dbo.Release WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE Id = CONVERT(UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, '@{pipeline().parameters.releaseId}')
SELECT * FROM dbo.Filter WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE SubjectId IN (SELECT Id FROM dbo.Subject WHERE ReleaseId = CONVERT(UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, '@{pipeline().parameters.releaseId}'))

SELECT * FROM dbo.FilterGroup WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE FilterId IN (SELECT id FROM dbo.Filter WHERE SubjectId in (SELECT Id FROM Subject WHERE ReleaseId = CONVERT(UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, '@{pipeline().parameters.releaseId}')))

SELECT * FROM dbo.FilterItem WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE FilterGroupId IN (
SELECT Id FROM dbo.FilterGroup WHERE FilterId IN (
SELECT Id FROM dbo.Filter WHERE SubjectId IN (SELECT Id FROM Subject WHERE  ReleaseId = CONVERT(UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, '@{pipeline().parameters.releaseId}'))))
SELECT * FROM dbo.IndicatorGroup WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE SubjectId IN (select Id FROM  Subject WHERE ReleaseId = CONVERT(UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, '@{pipeline().parameters.releaseId}'))

SELECT * FROM dbo.Indicator WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE IndicatorGroupId IN (SELECT Id FROM dbo.IndicatorGroup WHERE SubjectId in (SELECT Id FROM Subject WHERE ReleaseId = CONVERT(UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, '@{pipeline().parameters.releaseId}')))

SELECT * FROM dbo.Location WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE Id IN (SELECT LocationId FROM dbo.Observation WHERE SubjectId in (select Id FROM Subject WHERE ReleaseId = CONVERT(UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, '@{pipeline().parameters.releaseId}')))
SELECT * FROM dbo.Subject WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ReleaseId IN (SELECT Id FROM dbo.Release WHERE Id = CONVERT(UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, '@{pipeline().parameters.releaseId}'))
SELECT * FROM dbo.Observation WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE SubjectId IN (select Id FROM Subject WHERE ReleaseId = CONVERT(UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, '@{pipeline().parameters.releaseId}'))

SELECT * FROM dbo.ObservationFilterItem WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ObservationId IN (SELECT Id FROM Observation WHERE SubjectId IN (SELECT Id FROM Subject WHERE ReleaseId = CONVERT(UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, '@{pipeline().parameters.releaseId}')))
SELECT * FROM dbo.Footnote WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ReleaseId = CONVERT(UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, '@{pipeline().parameters.releaseId}')

source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT * FROM dbo.SubjectFootnote WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE SubjectId IN (SELECT Id FROM dbo.Subject WHERE ReleaseId = CONVERT(UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, '@{pipeline().parameters.releaseId}'))

SELECT * FROM dbo.IndicatorFootnote WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE IndicatorId IN (SELECT I.Id FROM dbo.IndicatorGroup IG JOIN dbo.Indicator I ON IG.Id = I.IndicatorGroupId JOIN dbo.Subject S ON IG.SubjectId = S.Id WHERE S.ReleaseId = CONVERT(UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, '@{pipeline().parameters.releaseId}'))

SELECT * FROM dbo.FilterFootnote WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE FilterId IN (SELECT F.Id FROM dbo.Filter F JOIN dbo.Subject S ON F.SubjectId = S.Id WHERE S.ReleaseId = CONVERT(UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, '@{pipeline().parameters.releaseId}'))

SELECT * FROM dbo.FilterGroupFootnote WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE FilterGroupId IN (SELECT FG.Id FROM dbo.Filter F JOIN dbo.FilterGroup FG ON F.Id = FG.FilterId JOIN dbo.Subject S ON F.SubjectId = S.Id WHERE S.ReleaseId = CONVERT(UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, '@{pipeline().parameters.releaseId}'))

SELECT * FROM dbo.FilterItemFootnote WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE FilterItemId IN (SELECT FI.Id FROM dbo.Filter F JOIN dbo.FilterGroup FG ON F.Id = FG.FilterId JOIN dbo.FilterItem FI ON FG.Id = FI.FilterGroupId JOIN dbo.Subject S ON F.SubjectId = S.Id WHERE S.ReleaseId = CONVERT(UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, '@{pipeline().parameters.releaseId}'))
